Game.Name: High School! Kimengumi (Japan)
Game.plot: This translation was originally released as a ROM, so we cant offer the original distribution here. However, we can offer a patch made from the translation that you can use here.Hurrah!Anyway, the patch translates everything that needs translating. The only problem I had with it was missing punctuation, and the fact that the Throw? item on the main menu actually meant Throw away?, so I was shooting myself in the foot before I read the walkthrough on GameFAQs. Though, I guess that and the rather dry script make it a very authentic translation for a game of its age.It would have been nice if the authors had released the translation as a patch, but what this thing really needs is a readme, because without any clues the game is beyond understanding.http://www.romhacking.net/trans/883/
Game.Notes: High School! Kimengumi (??????! ???) is a Sega Master System game based upon the 1985 anime adaptation of High School! Kimengumi. Pony Canyon brought it to the MSX2 in 1987, though both copies were only released in Asia.
